summary: Adds a lore-friendly book to the world of Skyrim that assist in Alchemy.
descriptionHtml:
[center]***NEW VERSION NOW OUT, 3 VOLUME SET***
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29840/]The Big Book of Alchemy v2[/url][/center]


README:

\"Good day, 


This is a very simple mod that adds one book to the world of Skyrim written by a Bosmer named: Somnus the Archer. Somnus has spent his entire life traveling Skyrim and compiling this brilliant volume devoted to the love of Alchemy. You can find his book at most Apothecaries and there has been sightings around Riverwood. 

I thank you for using my mod, and wish you as much enjoyment as I have in the world of Skyrim.


Best regards

-=2RTR=- Somnus


Feel free to PM me (on the Nexsus) with any questions, gripes and concerns. Cheers.


========================================================================================
INSTALLATION:
========================================================================================

Place the TheBigBookofAlchemy.esp file in the Data folder of your Skyrim Dir.. Activate as per the norm... Enjoy


V1.0\"


========================================================================================
NOTES:
========================================================================================

I am currently working on a revised version that will include:

-Hand drawn pictures
-Habits and observations of wildlife
-Where to find flora and ingredients
-Powerful and expensive potions and poison combinations

Due to the limitation on my internet at present (150MB a day) the new version will not be released until I am at home and have a proper connection speed. Furthermore, I will be including a completely new .nif model for the book with version 2. Cheers and thank you for your support... 

-=2RTR=- Somnus


========================================================================================
TRANSLATIONS:
========================================================================================
